Jargon Term: You will need to follow up with the plastic surgeons in about one week to have your sutures removed.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: You will also need to follow up with the neurosurgeons in four weeks to make sure that the blood around your brain is stable.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: You will need to get another CT scan of your head before your follow up appointment.

It is very important that you follow up with your primary care doctor after you leave rehab. It is also important for you to discuss ways to help you refrain from alcohol use and prevent injuries in the future.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - PCP appointment

Jargon Term: STOP the following medications until you follow up with your doctors to determine when it is safe to restart: - bupropion - acamprosate - naltrexone - simvastatin - aspirin - Trazodone
